p: The evolution of relative monthly incidence is shown in Figure 5, for each of the two studied periods and compatible with two types of RHD due to different lagoviruses (GI.1 and GI.2). Season was a risk factor enabling RHD. From 2011 onwards, RHD incidence was higher ( p < 0.001) during spring and summer (from April to August), than in autumn and winter (from September to March).
